text:
In the following, what does ``...`` mean?
julia> a = [[1 2], [3 4], [5 6]]
3-element Array{Array{Int64,2},1}:
 [1 2]
 [3 4]
 [5 6]

julia> hcat(a...)
1×6 Array{Int64,2}:
 1  2  3  4  5  6

elements.text:
In the following, what does ``...`` mean?
julia> a = [[1 2], [3 4], [5 6]]
3-element Array{Array{Int64,2},1}:
 [1 2]
 [3 4]
 [5 6]

julia> hcat(a...)
1×6 Array{Int64,2}:
 1  2  3  4  5  6

text:
This is the splat operator. It expands a to `[1 2],[3 4],[5 6]`
```julia> hcat(a...) == hcat([1 2],[3 4],[5 6])
true

help?> ...
search: ...

  ...

  The "splat" operator, ..., represents a sequence of arguments. ... can be ...```
